message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at $150. I believe it holds significant value and would be a worthwhile investment for you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I'm only able to pay up to $120 for this product. Thank you for understanding.
Thanks for the offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit. How about $135? I believe that's a fair price considering its value.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still unable to go above $120 for this product. Thank you for considering my offer.
